trans-unit.source: Notify me of new comments by e-mail
trans-unit.target: O novih komentarjih me obveščaj po elektronski pošti

trans-unit.source: You need to be logged in to add comments.

%s has created a new comment on your website.
---
%s
---
View: %s Edit: %s
If you are moderating comments, you have to log in to the back end to publish it.
trans-unit.target: %s je dodal nov komentar na vašem spletnem mestu.⏎ ⏎ ---⏎ ⏎ %s⏎ ⏎ ---⏎ ⏎ Preglej: %s⏎ Uredi: %s⏎ ⏎ Če komentarje moderirate, se morate prijaviti v administracijo in ga potrditi.

trans-unit.source: Your comment has been added and is now pending for approval.
trans-unit.target: Tvoj komentar je bil dodan in sedaj čaka na potrditev.

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
please confirm that you want to be notified of new comments by e-mail on this page:
%s
---
Confirm: %s Cancel: %s
trans-unit.target: Zdravo %s,⏎ ⏎ prosimo potrdite, da želite biti o novih komentarjih na tem spletnem mestu obveščeni preko e-pošte:⏎ ⏎ %s⏎ ⏎ ---⏎ ⏎ Potrditev: %s⏎ Preklic: %s⏎

trans-unit.source: A new comment has been added on %s
trans-unit.target: Na %s je bil dodan nov komentar

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
a new comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
%s
---
To cancel your subscription, please click here: %s
trans-unit.target:
Zdravo %s,
nov komentar je bil dodan na strani, na katero ste naročeni:
%s
---
Za preklic vaše naročnine, prosim kliknite tukaj: %s
